content: bestitched shawl a witching hour knits design materials - approx 425 yds of fingering weight yarn - us 6 circular needle 24 - tapestry needle for weaving in ends - stitch markers if desired gauge 4 5 sts per inch in stockinette stitch after blocking on us 6 needle or size needed for gauge pattern abbreviations and techniques - k knit - p purl - sts stitches - kfb knit in the front and back of the stitch - yo yarn over - k2tog knit two stitches together - sps k2tog slip_stitch back to left needle pass second stitch over last one on left needle slip back to right needle instructions cast on 2 sts work set up row as follows row 1 knit row 2 kfb kfb row 3 knit row 4 k1 kfb kfb k1 row 5 k2 kfb k1 k2 row 6 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 7 sts total work the following 12 row increase section until at 103 sts 16 total repeats row 1 3 5 7 9 k to last 2 sts yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 11 k2 *yo k2tog* repeat from *to* to last 2 sts yo k2 after row 12 of final repeat you will begin decreasing for the second half of the shawl work decrease sections as follows decrease section 1 row 1 3 5 7 9 k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 11 k2 *yo k2tog* repeat from *to* 38 times k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 move on to next section decrease section 2 row 1 3 5 7 9 k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 11 k2 *yo k2tog* repeat from *to* 30 times k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 move on to next section decrease section 3 row 1 3 5 7 9 k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 11 k2 *yo k2tog* repeat from *to* 22 times k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 move on to next section decrease section 4 row 1 3 5 7 9 k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 11 k2 *yo k2tog* repeat from *to* 14 times k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 move on to next section decrease section 5 row 1 3 5 7 9 k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 row 2 4 6 8 10 12 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 11 k2 *yo k2tog* repeat from *to* 6 times k to last 5 sts sps yo k2 move onto next
